intro: Ptarmica grandiflora, commonly known as the large-flowered tansy, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. Ptarmica grandiflora is often found in moist meadows and woodland edges, thriving in temperate climates. It is valued for its aromatic properties and has been used in traditional herbal medicine.
